name: SSTV - OG Picture Sharing #1
description: Slow-scan television (SSTV) is a picture transmission method used mainly by amateur radio operators, to transmit and receive static pictures via radio. Was also used in the Apollo Missions to transmit images from the moon's surface. I received these on my HF radio on the 20 meter band (14.233.00mhz) 10+ years ago.
